description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission ref P2015/5319/S73 dated 10/10/2016.  The amendments include revisions to retail unit windows and door; moving the retail unit entrance doors; moving the basement dividing wall between retail units 1 and 2; and amendments to conditions 2 and 25 to refer to amended drawing numbers.
decision_conditions:
This decision confirms the Council's agreement that the following alternative wording of conditions 2 and 25 of planning permission reference P2015/5319/S73 is acceptable:
 
CONDITION 2: The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans and documents:

REASON: To comply with Section 70(1)(a) of the Town and Country Act 1990 as amended and the Reason for Grant also for the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.

CONDITION 25: The shopfronts shall be installed strictly in accordance with the details approved under planning decision P2018/0611/AOD, as amended by the details and materials indicated within the '1 & 2-5 Benjamin Street: Retail Units 1 & 2 S96a Application' document (prepared by AHMM, dated August 2018).

REASON: To ensure that the resulting appearance and construction of the development is of a high standard.
